author: Nintendo of America
description:
Find your way home in Windswept, out now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/windswept-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01   

Marbles and Checkers need your help getting home after a mega-storm blows everyone away. This 90s buddy-platformer has over 40 stages, 5 unique worlds, loads of friendly animal companions, mini-games and unlockables, and even more to collect!
 
Don't be fooled by its cute charm, though, the journey home won't be an easy one. Get Swept away! 

#NintendoSwitch #Windswept 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: Windswept – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Ready to lend a hand? All Hands on Deck is out now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/all-hands-on-deck-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01   
  
Team up in this adorable co-op puzzle platformer where you play as hands! Use Rock, Paper, Scissors, and a variety of handy items to solve puzzles, explore playful worlds, and rescue the plushie friends together! 
 
No one's left empty-handed. Swap items, work together, and see what teamwork can do. Will you work hand-in-hand or will you become a handful? 
 
#AllHandsOnDeck #NintendoSwitch 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: All Hands on Deck – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Monster Hunter Stories 3 comes to Nintendo Switch 2 on March 13, 2026. Pre-order now: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/monster-hunter-stories-3-twisted-reflection-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01   

Embark on an expansive RPG adventure and a true evolution of the Monster Hunter Stories series, filled with memorable twists and turns. Palamutes, new allies, an encounter with the living mountain, Yama Tsukami, and much more await you beyond the Meridian. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #MonsterHunter 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s
